name: ai-agent-training-monorepo
description: AI Agent Training Class - Monorepo with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.start:web: cd apps/web && pnpm run build && pnpm run start
scripts.test: pnpm run test:api && pnpm run test:web
scripts.test:trading: cd apps/trading-agent && python -m pytest tests/ || echo 'Trading agent tests not implemented yet'
scripts.setup: pnpm run setup:api && pnpm run setup:web && pnpm run setup:trading
scripts.setup:trading: cd apps/trading-agent && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements_simple.txt && pip install jinja2
scripts.monorepo: pnpm run observability:start && timeout /t 10 /nobreak >nul && concurrently "pnpm run start:trading" "pnpm run start:api" "pnpm run start:web"
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:web && pnpm run clean:api && pnpm run clean:trading
scripts.clean:trading: cd apps/trading-agent && rmdir /s /q venv 2>nul & del /q reports\*.txt 2>nul & powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Directory -Filter __pycache__ | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force"

author: AI Training Class
